title: Scandinavian Minimalist House with Rooftop Deck Near Suwałki Waterfront
description: This newly renovated three-bedroom, three-bathroom house embodies minimalist Scandinavian design with clean interiors and abundant natural light. The spacious living area flows seamlessly into a sleek, contemporary kitchen, while upstairs, each bedroom features soothing tones and bespoke carpentry. A private walk-in closet in the master suite and access to a generous rooftop deck provide refined touches for those who value creativity and tranquility. Every element has been thoughtfully curated for harmonious, functional living.
neighborhood_description: Located in Polnocne, the house sits in a low-density, historic neighborhood. Residents enjoy the safe atmosphere, serene streets, and proximity to Suwałki’s picturesque waterfront. Essential highways are easily accessible, making incoming and outgoing travel efficient while you bask in tranquility inspired by the area’s charming heritage.
key_features: open plan living and kitchen space
lifestyle_benefits: inspiring historic setting close to nature
safe community for families and professionals
target_buyer: Perfect for artists, designers, or creative professionals who value a calm and visually inspiring environment to live and work. Suitable for a small family or dynamic couple seeking spacel conveniently connected by highway.
market_positioning: This distinguished property offers a rare balance of modern comfort and historic neighborhood charm. It stands apart as an ideal home for creatives drawn to Suwałki’s peaceful riverside ambiance, with open spaces both inside and out—exceptionally positioned within the local market for those who appreciate minimalist architecture in a quiet yet connected locale.
